titles.title: Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/5/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on February 5, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates Members and Delegates to the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Armed Services; (3) Budget; (4) Education and the Workforce; (5) Financial Services; (6) Government Reform; (7) House Administration; (8) International Relations; (9) Resources; (10) Science; (11) Small Business; (12) Standards of Official Conduct; and (13) Veterans' Affairs.
